modules.description: type t = private { content : string; focus : bool; } Provides functions to render text-based interfaces, manage focus states, and update displayed content dynamically. Operates on structured views containing string content and boolean focus indicators. Used to build interactive terminal menus and form-based user interfaces.

Handles HTTP/1.1 request parsing, response generation, and connection management using an asynchronous pull-based model. Operates on byte streams, headers, and structured request/response objects. Enables integration with Lwt or Async for non-blocking network I/O in web server or client implementations.

manages dynamic text interfaces with focus tracking, using a private record type containing a string and a boolean. It supports rendering, updating, and managing focus states for terminal-based UI elements. Operations include content modification, focus switching, and real-time display updates. Examples include building interactive menus, handling user input, and maintaining stateful text views.
